name: Keys of a Gamespace
description:
An expressive game is all about experiencing someone else’s psychological, social, cultural problems and dealing with the moral and/or ethical dilemmas which result from them.

Keys of a Gamespace fits in that approach of video games, which is linked to Sébastien Genvo’s studies on game design and video games expressive potential. Just like cinema, or comic books, video games are not a minor way of expression. It can also, in its way, deal with serious or tough themes. The following works, for example, were references for our project : Mystic River, EraserHead and Twin Peaks, which happen to be some cinematographic references ; while A distant neighborhood, Black Hole, and American Splendor were some comic books references.

name: The Pow-er
description:
That there The POW-er is a punchslinger to the manner born, though she ain't exactly among the warmest of 'em. She's got places to be and bones to crush. Of such appointments she travels to and from by means of locomotive. She ain't in the business of lettin' strangers take her spot at the trainhouse neither — and to The POW-er, everybody's a stranger.

Crash through three unique stages and get The POW-er to the station before the train arrives, with enough strength to uproot whatever poor soul finds themselves sat at the single seat this side of the Milky Way that'll quickest get them a knuckle to the nose... Not that The POW-er needs your help none anyhow.

This game was created in seven days for the Bigmode Game Jam 2025.

name: Somnifuge
description:
Compelled by a mysterious note, you step into the grand mansion. As you explore its dark corridors, you must solve cryptic puzzles, confront the residents, and uncover your purpose.

SOMNIFUGE is a first-person indie horror game that blends exploration, puzzle-solving and psychological horror. Drawing inspiration from the eerie atmospheres of Silent Hill and Alone in the Dark—as well as the many indie horror games they influenced—SOMNIFUGE calls back to PSX-era horror with its retro visuals.

description: Purchase the Destiny 2: Heresy Silver Bundle and receive the Spinning Seat Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase Heresy, cosmetics, and more!

name: Minion Masters: Mordar’s Malediction
description:
Mordar the Mad Necromancer’s cruelty knows no bounds. Mordar’s Malediction is a great +300% value bundle that gives you what you need to build your own Mordar deck, including the Mordar master himself and the infamous Ghost card (Legendary!). It also gives you a headstart in this month’s Season Pass.

Includes:
- Mordar (Master)
- Soul Collector Mordar (Legendary Skin)
- 3x Ghost (Legendary Card)
- 20x Spirit Vessel
- 20x Undying Skeleton
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Mordar’s specialty is raising minions from the dead with his Tombstone ability. Use Ghost to take over your opponent’s minions, then raise them from the dead on your side! Use your trusted skeleton servants to bolster your ranks: Undying Skeleton won’t stay dead for long, and Spirit Vessel gives your other minions a bonus on death. Use all this death-y goodness and more to overwhelm your opponents!
With this Master Box, you have the perfect kit to become a supreme necromancer!

name: Bubble Dreams 3D
description:
Gogi the rabbit has misplaced his collection of precious rainbow gems... and they've all fallen into several different 3D dream worlds!

Using his magic bubble ball, help Gogi get his gems back by rolling, drifting, bouncing, and boosting your way through a handful of shiny platforming stages without falling off!

name: Minion Masters: Kaboom Kingdom
description:
The KaBOOM Kingdom DLC is a great +300% value bundle that gives you what you need to build your own Scrat deck, including the legendary Wreckinator 9000! It also gives you a headstart in this month’s Season Pass.

Includes:
- 3x Wreckinator 9000 (Legendary)
- 5x Boom Buggy (Supreme)
- 20x Scrat Tank
- 40x Zeppelin Bomber
- 40x Cannon Roller
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Roll out the heavy machinery with this Scrat pack that lets you roll over your opponents. Let the Mighty Wreckinator and Scrat Tank plow down smaller enemies while protecting your Boom Buggy and Cannon Roller and let them deal out the damage from safety.
With this DLC, you have the perfect Scrat kit to become King of the Scrats!

name: Minion Masters: Best Plan No Plan!
description:
Scrat Infestation is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Scrat faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Scrat cards, including the luckiest Scrat alive Jolo the Hero Scrat (Legendary!), and get a head-start in this month’s Season Pass!

Includes:
- 3x Jolo the Hero Scrat (Legendary)
- 5x Boom Buggy (Supreme)
- 20x Scratillery
- 40x Scrat Horde
- 40x Propeller Scrats
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

The industrious and ruthless Scrat uses sheer numbers to overwhelm their enemies. And if that wasn’t enough, they back up their formidable frontline with machines of death that can rain death (and more Scrats) from the skies. Use Scrat Horde and Propeller Scrats to protect and power up your Boom Buggy that can devastate the enemy defenses, and use Scratillery so wage some more carnage and bolster your forces at the same time. Jolo, being the lucky Scrat that he is, can dodge enemy fire to protect your army. Sometimes.
With this Faction Box, you have the perfect kit to become a Scrat commander!

name: Word Tower Puzzle
description:
Word Tower Premium Puzzle is the best addictive word search game that you can play offline and without any annoying ads,
this new word search game is a great combination of classic word game, word quest game and word quiz game that's challenging your mind and makes you learn new vocabulary.

name: Minion Masters: Zealous Inferno
description:
Zealous Inferno is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Empyrean faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Empyrean cards, including the stalwart commander Caeleth Dawnhammer (Legendary!) and 2 exclusive Empyrean cosmetics.

Includes the new season card - Brother of the Burning Fist!

Includes:
- 3x Caeleth Dawnhammer (Legendary)
- 5x Sun Burn (Supreme)
- 20x Banner Man
- 40x Brother of the Burning Fist
- 40x Legionnaires
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 1x exclusive Legendary Empyrean Avatar - Animated!
- 1x exclusive Legendary Empyrean Emote - Animated!

The Empyrean Army keeps the enemy on the defensive with a strong blend of tough infantry and big minions to soak up damage. Take advantage of the Empyrean Army keyword that boosts your cards for playing multiple Empyrean cards. Use your Caeleth and Brother of the Burning Fist to lead your army and follow up with a group of Legionnaires, then put down a Bannerman to protect your Minions, and lastly, finish off with Sun Burn to send your army into a zealous rage!

name: Minion Masters: Charging Into Darkness
description:
With Ardera's true agenda revealed, High-Mage Leiliel races to the Whispering Woods to find an old friend. She’ll need all the help she can muster to brave her way through the raging battle between Crystal Elves and Accursed…

The Charging Into Darkness Faction Box will provide you with all the Crystal Elf support you need to wage your own war against the undead! Containing +300% value of Crystal Elf cards, including the studious High-Mage Leiliel and 2 exclusive Crystal Elf cosmetics.

Includes:
- 3x High-mage Leiliel
- 5x Leiliel's Vortex
- 20x Border Patrol
- 50x Crystal Construct
- 50x Lone Scout
- 5x Power Tokens
- 1x Legendary Emote
- 1x Supreme Avatar

Crystal Elves make use of their Mana Surge to output huge amounts of damage. Keeping your Mana at 6+ is key to effectively utilising them, as well as keeping them protected. Use your Crystal Construct to protect the frail Crystal Elf cards, while using Leiliel’s Vortex to pull your enemy’s minions away and render them helpless! High-Mage Leiliel herself is a great counter to long range minions that will try and dispatch your elves, as her Mana Surge enables her to reflect incoming damage!

name: Minion Masters: Furry Fury
description:
The Furry Fury DLC is a great +300% value bundle to unleash the fury of the Cold North on your enemies! including the legendary Fergus Flagon Fighter! It also gives you a headstart in the Season Pass.

Includes:
- Snow Wall Arena
- Ravager (Master)
- Gray Wolf Ravager Master Skin
- 3x Fergus Flagon Fighter (Legendary card)
- 5x Mountain Gale (Supreme card)
- 20x Adventure Party
- 40x Wild Stonebjorn
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Embrace your inner beast with Ravager. Use Ravager and his friends BRUTUS and TERROR BRUTUS to make crushing attacks. Support Ravager’s attacks with sturdy Stoutheart to make unstoppable pushes. The pack also includes the custom arena Snow Wall which is the perfect setting to unleash the fury of the north!

name: Minion Masters: Vanguard
description:
The Vanguard DLC is a great +300% value bundle to roll out the heavy machinery! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!

Includes:
- 5x Siege Imperator Ruby (Legendary card)
- 5x Magnetic Bombs (Supreme card)
- 20x A.I.M Bot
- 40x S1ege Br3aker
- 40x M0nitor Gn4ts
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Assume control of the Outland invasion force. Use the heavy Siege Imperator Ruby and its smaller S1ege Br3eaker cousin to pave the way for your M0nitor Gn4ts and Magnetic bombs to wreak havoc! In the meantime, save up Outlander Tech by playing Outlander cards to empower your A.I.M Bot to be a force to be reckoned with.

With this DLC, you have the perfect kit to start your galactic conquest!

name: Minion Masters: Outlandish Operations
description:
Outlandish Operations is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Outlander faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Outlander cards and Master, including the outlaw Settsu (Master), and get a headstart in this month’s Season Pass!

Includes:
- Settsu (Master)
- Infested Settsu Skin (Legendary Master Skin)
- 5x Infiltration (Supreme)
- 20x A.I.M Bot
- 40x Beam Of Doom
- 40x S.T.INT
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

The high-tech Outlanders employ ranged minions and a formidable air force to outmaneuver their enemies. Build up your Outlander Tech by playing Outlander cards, which empowers certain Outlander machines to make a strong push, then finish off your opponent by dropping off marines behind enemy lines with Infiltration, and combine it with Settsu’s Blast Entry for an extra devastating finish.
With this Faction Box, you have the perfect kit to become an Outlander Prime!

name: Minion Masters: Voidborne Onslaught
description:
Voidborne Onslaught is the Faction Box for starting your Voidborne Army – or adding some reinforcements to your existing Voidborne collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Voidborne Minions, including the massive Legendary Colossus as well as 2 exclusive Voidborne cosmetics.

Includes:
- 3x Colossus (Legendary)
- 5x Succubus (Supreme)
- 20x Rammer
- 40x Nether Bat
- 40x Morgrul's Ragers
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 1x Legendary Faction Box exclusive Voidborne Avatar - Animated Colossus!
- 1x Legendary Faction Box exclusive Voidborne Emote - Animated Doompuffer!

The Voidborne faction is aggressive with high speed and dark magic. With this Faction Box, you can immediately experiment with the "Voidborne Wound" mechanic using "Morgrul’s Ragers" which makes your minions stronger if any of your Voidborne Minions wounded the opponent.

name: Minion Masters: Uprising
description:
Uprising is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Zen-Chi faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Zen-Chi cards, including the wise and electrifying Shi-hou Zensei Shen Stormstrike (Legendary!) and a head-start in this month’s Season Pass!

Includes:
- 3x Shen Stormstrike (Legendary)
- 5x Lightning Bolt (Supreme)
- 20x Zap Shrine
- 40x Jade Flingers
- 40x Blue Golem
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

The mysterious and secretive Zen-Chi harness the destructive and nurturing aspects of nature. Jade Flingers plant Growthburst Shrooms that makes your strong Blue Golem even stronger. Use Zap Shrine to stun enemies from a distance, then blast away even the biggest threats with Lightning Bolt, or let Shen Stormstrike deal with them with his lightning attack that damages stunned enemies.

With this Faction Box, you have the perfect kit to become a Zen-Chi Master!

name: Minion Masters: Crystal Conquest
description:
Crystal Conquest is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Crystal Elf faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Crystal Elf cards, including the powerful commander Lord-Sentinel Thelec (Legendary!) and 2 exclusive Crystal Elf cosmetics.

Includes:
- 3x Lord-Sentinel Thelec (Legendary)
- 5x Guardian (Supreme)
- 20x Crystal Arcanist
- 40x Arcane Ring
- 40x Crystal Archers
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 1x exclusive Legendary Crystal Elf Avatar - Animated!
- 1x exclusive Legendary Crystal Elf Emote - Animated!

The Crystal Elves use overwhelming force from a distance, and hidden safely behind huge golems. Lord-Sentinel Thelec fields a whole battalion of his own if you bring enough spells. The bulky Guardian takes all the damage from your Border Patrol and Crystal Archers so they can bring the pain. Use Arcane Ring to punish anyone who tries to get too close.
With this Faction Box, you have the perfect kit to begin your watch as a Crystal Elf Conqueror.

name: Minion Masters: Might of the Slither Lords
description:
Might of the Slither Lords is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Slither faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Slither cards, including the cunning Legendary Musketeer and 2 exclusive Slither cosmetics.

Includes:
- 3x Musketeer (Legendary)
- 5x Harbinger (Supreme)
- 20x Rabid Prowler
- 40x Daggerfall
- 40x Slitherbound
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 1x exclusive Legendary Slither Avatar - Animated!
- 1x exclusive Legendary Slither Emote - Animated!

The Slither Lords use trickery, poison and control to keep their enemies at bay. Keep the strongest minions at arm’s reach with Musketeer’s Dodge ability while Harbinger controls the battlefield with his extremely long range. Slitherbound’s poison keeps enemies’ health low while your Rabid Prowler moves in for the kill with it’s deadly Pounce ability!

With this Faction Box, you have the perfect kit to start your reign as a Slither Lord.

name: Samurise
description: A runner/platformer where play as a samurai trying to save your cat from demons. Your character runs automatically while you control your jumps and attacks.

name: The Seven Realms: Realm 1 - Terran
description: The Seven Realms is a fantasy, story-driven, adult visual novel where your choices will shape the fate of the Realms and the people around you. Will you be a Fair or a Strong Ruler? Will fate be enough for you, or will you want more? The choices are yours to make.

name: Power Rangers: Mystic Force
description: The old legends say, that ones upon a time there lived people on Earth, that possessed powers of magic, with the help of which they could change and decorate the world. But one day these people had to fight with mighty powers of evil, called the Underworld. Five courageous people-soldiers, possessing that mighty magic power imprisoned the whole army of evil in the underworld, putting magic seals-spells on the entrance to this world. But the victory was paid dear for - these very warriors were killed or disappeared in this battle.

name: Arcade Archives: Märchen Maze
description: “MARCHEN MAZE” is an action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1988. Control the main character, Alice, and take back the Mirror Country, which has been conquered by the evil queen. Use soap bubble attacks and jumps to advance through the area and defeat the boss waiting at the end.

name: Apex Legends: From the Rift
description: Go original and experience the beginning of Apex Legends again. Relive the rush of that first drop in Launch Royale then get reacquainted with Lifeline, revived with new abilities to take the frontlines, glide to reposition, and more. Tear through the Outlands with Rift Relics, offering cosmic abilities and weapons that dial up your power. Wield the Raptor’s Claw, a new Universal Mythic Melee Cosmetic and harness the madness of science in the new Battle Pass Split 1.

name: Smile, you're being filmed together
description: Dive into an intense psychological horror experience with Smile, You’re Being Filmed: Together, the multiplayer version where observation and cooperation are your greatest assets.

name: Croak Crusader: The Champion of Canada
description: Do you dare save the Land of the Maple Leaf? Croak Crusader is a fast-paced, momentum-based action platformer featuring tight controls, explosive combat, and a versatile grapple mechanic.

name: Gelluloid Domination
description: Gelluloid Domination is a fast-paced strategy game of fantasy biology. Start with a single fragile cell and expand across the network, assimilating rivals to grow your gel-powered army. Evolve mutations, unlock new abilities, and outmaneuver deadly pathogens. Adapt and conquer, expand or be consumed. Every decision shapes the network — will you achieve total domination?

name: Bober Constructions
description: Bober k***w. Patrz jakie bydle! And even more than just one. 4 beaver-builders, and you can control one of them. Create structures, manage time and resources, watch out for obstacles, and remember, fast action is the key to success!

name: Motocross Urban Fever
description: Motocross Urban Fever is a 3d sports game developed by Miniclip and Silent Bay Studios that was currently unavailable to play. It features 9 stages, 3 types of races, 3 race tracks, numerous airborne stunts, and 3 racers for players to pick: Miniclip Fury, Green Lizard, and Flaming Skull. It is the second of the three Motocross Fever series of games after Motocross Fever.

name: Super Emo Alpaca
description:
This is the secret garden where only you and we exist.

Breed us, discover weird and bizarre new shapes of alpacas and train us to get out into the world.

name: Space Duck: Escape
description: Collect equipment and climb upwards to assist Puddles the Duck escape from an erupting volcanic planet in this fast paced rogue-lite vertical platformer. Move quickly to avoid the rising lava flows to help this Space Duck Escape!

name: Operation Get Bike Back 2: Pedal Recall
description: A sequel to the 22 year old map Operation Get Bike Back except this time it takes place on Mars. Find all the disassembled bike parts scattered across the map across the Martian city (which houses apartments, stores and the usual hi-tech facilities) is open-ended just like the city in the original OGBB was.

name: Perfected Doom 3
description:
A gameplay-altering mod that changes the slow pacing of the base game, to a more fast-paced action-horror shooter. The mod attempts to completely overhaul the entire game with new monsters, rebalanced weapons, rebalanced monster stats, better graphics, new gameplay features, and much more.

There are 2 versions of the mod:
Vanilla Doom 3 & Doom 3: RoE.

name: Neffy: Moonlight Labyrinth
description: Neffy -Moonlight Labyrinth- is a single-player action-puzzle game created specifically for the VR platform. Summoned to the VR world, you control Neffy, a girl who can transform into a cat, while manipulating the labyrinth's gimmicks to reach the labyrinth's exit.

name: Graymerca
description: A full-length simulation RPG (strategy SLG) that chronicles the civil wars of an empire and the offensives and defenses of continental countries for three generations.

name: Snooker
description: The first release of Snooker by Amsoft. After obtaining the license to use snooker champion Alex Higgins shortly after release, the game was pulled and reissued with the title 'Alex Higgins' World Snooker'.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VII: VR
description:
The award-winning Civilization strategy series comes to virtual and mixed reality for the first time in franchise history. Experience a revolutionary new chapter from Firaxis Games with Sid Meier's Civilization VII - VR, only on Meta Quest 3 and 3S. Take your place at the Command Table and immerse yourself as you build an empire to stand the test of time.
Chart a course for your people, engage with other leaders, research technological breakthroughs, and conquer or cooperate with rival civilizations as you explore the far reaches of the unknown world.

name: Welcome to Maison Chichigami
description: Deep in the mountains, there is said to be a legendary hot spring: called the Spirit Spring. Becoming lost on the way to the spring, you are rescued by a mysterious, reclusive family. But what secrets does this family hide away in their manor?

description: Sin descripción

name: Hidden Tomatoes 3
description: Explore serene forests, sparkling river, and rustic rural houses in *Hidden Tomatoes 3*! Find 100 cleverly hidden tomatoes in a peaceful yet challenging hidden object adventure. With stunning visuals and relaxing gameplay, it's fun for all ages. Can you uncover them all?

name: Rescue Q
description: The objective of this “Top-Down puzzle action game” is to assist rescue workers in their movements until they can rush to a person in distress and rescue him or her. Various terrains and gimmicks will block your and the rescue team's way.

description: superhuman is a visual novel full of battles and romance developed at Ren'py.

name: Bluesky Map Jam
description: This project started as a way for Doom mappers and modders to find each other on the new social media site and to show off their skills. The result was 44 maps from mappers of all disciplines with all kinds of aesthetics and gameplay styles.

description: Sin descripción

name: Double Dangerous
description: Shooting freedom—aim anywhere and unleash chaos with dual guns!

name: Omega No Sunshine 2
description:
This game is an arcade-collectathon-exploration game where an unknow being is doing its best to avoid the end of his/her world because of the sun disappearing. Through different places the player have to run and collect sun rings to progress ever further. The game include a story, additional content and a rpg oriented dlc. The base game minimum game time is at least about 16hours.

This video game is born after omega no sunshine 1 (2019) made by the galoxyum studio.

name: Shopping Fever
description: Let the shopping fever get the best of you!

name: Pixicharm: Darkwood Dash
description: Sin descripción

name: Static Dread
description: Lovecraft meets Papers, Please. Play as a lighthouse keeper and guide ships safely into the harbor using your radio. Survive the presence of something impossible, and don’t let the shadows consume you!

name: Noelle: Lost Soul
description: Noelle: Lost Soul is a DELTARUNE fangame set during an alternative ending of the Chapter 2's Weird Route.

name: Bladerunners SX
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic ThirdScape

name: Sonic: Dark Horizon

name: Foliage vs. Undead
description: A game created with the proposal of being a 3D version of Plants vs. Zombies.

name: Moon Rat
description: A charming platformer game about a Rat who embarks on an adventure where you collect cheese with properties that are out of this world.

name: Living_City
description: Watch Dogs mod that improves and expands the gameplay of the base game with custom missions, random events, new gadgets and several new features.

name: Frozen Ship
description: Frozen Ship is a first-person narrative adventure in the unique blending of survival, build&craft, and economic strategy genres.

name: Balancing Cats
description:
Tilt your phone to help a clever cat balance food while catching falling treats in a physics-based kitchen!

Challenge other players to reach the TOP!

name: Fortnite OG: Chapter 1 Season 2
description: Grab your Glider and jump off the Battle Bus as Fortnite OG enters Chapter 1 Season 2, bringing back beloved POIs like Tilted Towers and Shifty Shafts! The days of the Fort Knights are upon us again, so rise to the challenge and fight valiantly with upcoming loot like the Boogie Bomb and Minigun.

name: Prison Amok
description:
Prison Amok is a shooting gallery-type game. Convicts are attempting to escape across a field, and your job is to shoot them. The game features location-based damage, and limbs can be shot off.

Included are multiple types of guns.

name: Xtris
description: XTRIS is an arcade dexterity game for the Playdate console. The goal is to catch as many Xs as possible within 60 seconds by moving around tetronimo-inspired game boards. The game currently features 3 levels, complete with stat tracking, leaderboards, achievements, and unlockable skins.

name: Itoshi Kokoro
description: Itoshi Kokoro is the second game in a series by Miyuki Taito. The main focus is on young Javoo. As he strives for adventure he finds himself being a part of something much larger than himself.​

name: Memento in Marrow
description:
A girl has a strange wish, a will she wishes to carry on even after her present is over. How far will Yori go to have it carried out? Can Thelma even help with something so bizarre? Can something so wrong possibly feel so right?

A kinetic visual novel about two girls who try to make the best of things, and certainly, things could be much better.

name: American Cooking Simulator
description: What's more American than Fast Food? How about cooking it with guns! Switch between individual weapons to move ingredients, cook and deliver them to your customers before they lose their patience.

name: Nefarious Dreams
description:
Nefarious Dreams is a game that has Mario navigating a brand-new semi-linear set of 25 levels, boasting new graphics, enemy behaviour and environments plus some minor audio changes. It’s sure to keep both inexperienced and well-versed Mario players engaged as they try to puzzle out the path to the ending and find every secret level.

Oh yeah… and Mario goes to space. That is pretty cool.

name: Alquiem
description: Alquiem is a new Medieval RPG in which you will be able to gain strength through numerous classes and talent trees, professions and equipment to face the creatures that inhabit the lands of Odenzur. Its old-school style will remind all browser game fans of a familiar memory of Fighting, Loots and Relaxing.

name: Iron Convoy
description: Iron Convoy is a turn-based tactical survival game set in a brutal post-apocalyptic world. Manage your convoy, battle enemies, gather resources, and make tough decisions to survive. In this unforgiving world, only the strongest endure!

name: Astragali
description: astragali is a short 3d computer program in which you throw objects called "dice", each with their own unique upgrades. The numbers on these dice are combined with a revolutionary new gameplay mechanic called "addition" which is used to determine the winner each match.

name: Kirby Street
description: This mod of Fortune Street introduces 26 new characters and 18 unique boards to play with, directly from the Kirby franchise! There are balance changes, custom Mii accessories, and you can even play the original Fortune Street boards!

name: Magic Chess: Go Go
description: Experience MLBB's multiplayer strategy game – MCGG! Unleash your magic and dominate the chessboard!

name: Welcome Googoo
description: A game where you write party invitations using a selection of words and stickers.

name: Legends of Elumia
description:
Legends of Elumia (Elumia) is a next generation web 3.0 Massively Multiplayer Online RPG (MMORPG). Players can immerse themselves in various gameplay zones, engaging in multiplayer adventures, quests and fierce battles to gain epic loot items.

In the Elumia game world, players have full ownership of their characters and equipment. The governance token Elumia Crowns ($ELU) gives users a voice in the future direction of the game’s development.

name: Gretel's Honesty
description: A comic-like visual novel, expressing a new story based on the fairy tale “Hansel and Gretel”.

name: There's No Dragons
description: There's No Dragons is a hidden object game with a selection of 9 locations and random dragons to find for each of them.

name: Cipheur
description: Sin descripción

name: Leadlight
description:
Do you like pixel mosaics? Try a new approach at it with Leadlight!
Assemble stained glass mosaic from small shattered pieces - move, rotate and blend colors! Leadlight is a unique puzzle experience with 100 images for you to assemble.

name: Day Zero
description: Can you survive a zombie apocalypse? Day Zero is a text-based survival game where choices determine fate and ethical and moral decisions matter. Every choice shapes the story. Are you ready to test your limits in a zombie apocalypse?

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Fusion
description:
Plants Vs. Zombies: Fusion is a Plants Vs. Zombies fangame developed mainly by BlueFly using the unity engine.

The main concept of the game involves fusing your plants to make them stronger.

name: Dreamy Syrup
description: "Sato Ama," whom you met by chance at university, is an ardent fan of the virtual idol "Amaha Shiroppu" just like you! The two hit it off and go out together, talk about their favorite idols, and gradually become closer. However... "I almost got found out." A certain comment made by Amaha Shiroppu during a stream raises a question: "Could it be that Amaha Shiroppu is... Sato Ama?" Will you witness the virtual idol "Amaha Shiroppu" being found out? A thrilling love comedy where "dreams" and "reality" intersect!

name: Kiloton
description: Invade your neighbors, conduct bombing campaigns, research and develop nuclear arsenals, and grapple for diplomatic power in Kiloton, a dark and abstract new RTS that puts you in the room where potentially world-ending decisions are made.

name: Of the Devil: Episode 1
description: Unlock the first of five episodic murder mysteries with the Episode 1 DLC for "of the Devil" and dive headfirst into the dark and thrilling corporate conspiracy that unfolds when the father of modern android programming is found dead of apparent suicide.

name: Occultus Vitae: Hidden Life
description: A psychological horror adventure where you explore abandoned locations and unravel dark legends. Set in a remote castle hiding a Nazi black magic experiment gone wrong, you'll face haunting environments, challenging puzzles, and a fight to survive the horrors lurking within.

name: Dead Daylight
description: "DEADDAYLIGHT" is a side-scrolling platform action-adventure game.Developed independently by a single person. It tells the dark story of a protagonist who wakes up from a nightmare about the plague during a plague after the gods abandoned the earth, and then return to the Cathedral of Holy Light.

name: Caught by a Spider
description:
You've fallen into the spider's web.

Caught by a Spider is a short yandere Visual Novel where you talk to a Spider!

name: Chess Royale
description: Whether you’re a complete beginner or a highly experienced player, Chess Royale has everything you could need to enjoy one of the world’s greatest board games on your mobile device. Play with the AI, with friends, or with millions of strangers all over the world, then train your chess skills with tutorials, puzzles, and post-game analysis. One of the greatest things about chess is that there’s always something new to learn, and this beautifully designed app will allow you to keep on discovering the magic of chess and enhancing your love of the game day after day.

name: Beta Hospital
description:
Beta Hospital is a horror game with a lot of Internet memes, with some funny content, but the main tone is horror.
You will play Zeng Zhaofeng, to Beluta hospital to find his missing wife Zhai Yina, on the way will meet a strange woman Hu Yilian, she is an enemy or a friend?

name: Gravity's Apple
description: An action adventure game in which you guide a rolling apple. As you roll through various stages accompanied by soothing music, your goal is to reach the top of Newton's head.

name: Unblinking
description: Trapped on death row, unravel the dark mystery of an ancient horror to escape alive. Outsmart the abyss, cheat death - if you dare.

name: Catch the Candy: Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: The Silent Suite
description: You live in a hotel room. Everything seems normal—until a strange rumbling wakes you. Panic sets in as you realize you’re not alone. A killer is somewhere in the hotel… Trapped inside, you must navigate the eerie hallways, and find a way to escape… before it's too late.

name: Offline Games
description: Looking for a relaxing and entertaining way to pass the time without an internet connection? "100+ Offline Games No WiFi Fun" offers a carefully curated collection of puzzles and games designed to keep you engaged and entertained wherever you are. Whether you're traveling, commuting, or just unwinding at home, this app delivers endless offline fun.

name: Castlequest
description: The NES port of Castlequest. The object of the game is to navigate through Groken Castle to rescue Princess Margarita. The player can push certain objects throughout the game to accomplish progress. In some rooms, the prince can only advance to the next room by aligning cement blocks, Honey Jars, Candle Cakes, and Elevator Controlling Block.

name: Pokémon/Grand Order
description: "Pokémon/Grand Order" is a fangame that adapts the story of Fate/Grand Order, using resources from the original game and adjusting them to Pokémon mechanics, based on the Fate system.

name: Laundromat Manager Simulator
description: Step into the world of Laundromat Manager Simulator—where your entrepreneurial skills and creative flair combine to transform a modest laundromat into a bustling business empire! Manage every detail, from upgrading state-of-the-art equipment to designing a standout interior, as you attract loyal customers and outshine the competition. Whether you’re a savvy strategist or a creative decorator, this is your chance to build the ultimate neighborhood laundry hub. Success is just a spin cycle away, are you ready to take it?

name: Anna vs. Sentimental Fighter
description: A Doujin fighting game developed by 'unikurage' using characters from the "Hyper Anna" manga and "Sentimental Graffiti" game series.

name: Tryhard
description: Turn-based sports RPG about managing an underdog rugby club in New Zealand. Outsmart opponents and upgrade your squad, but also feed your dog and go on dates, in this epic saga of love, betrayal, and community sports.

name: The Jumping Melon Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Golfslinger
description:
An explosive mix of golf and shooting! Use a varied arsenal to launch your ball into a frantic multiplayer chaos!

Be the world best in the racing solo races or face off against up to 12 players in stylized Westernpunk environments and prove you're the best of the Golfslingers!

A game made for tryharder and having fun with your friends !

name: Musestruck
description:
A 2D Platformer RPG about art and magic. You play as JOURNEY and QUINN, two young artist friends who explore a mysterious magical world called NEGATIVE SPACE, to try and make it back home.

Journey must use his powers of illustration, and Quinn must use her powers of music to defeat comical and strange enemies, while slowly uncovering Negative Space's secrets, as it tests and strengthens the two's friendship along the way.

name: Mind 720
description: Survive for 100 seconds in each of the 10 unique levels. Enjoy the wrath of ten enemies , as they bring a plague of bullets.

name: Maimai Plus
description: An upgraded version to the original maimai cabinet, released on 13 December 2012.

name: Dead Air
description: An Indie Psychological Horror Rhythm Game. Featuring songs based off popular internet horror icons.

name: Mayéutica
description:
Only one can get the job. Review their resumes, ask them questions and find out what they hide under their skin. Every second counts.
Mayéutica is a narrative experience about four job candidates. Through their answers, they will discover truths hidden from themselves until they explode. Designed and programmed in 48 hours to participate in the Global Game Jam 2025, with the theme “Bubble”. Recognition for best narrative by the Francisco de Vitoria University.

name: Dinkum Together
description: 'Dinkum Together' is a pioneer life simulation game currently being developed by 5minlab, a Krafton studio, and is inspired by 'Dinkum', the beloved survival life sim created by Australian developer James Bendon.

name: Maimai Green Plus
description: An update to maimai GreeN cabinets, maimai GreeN PLUS released on February 26th, 2014 in Japan, following short location tests on January 31st, 2014.

description: An old school grid-based dungeon crawler with combo oriented non-turn-based combat.

name: Project Shadow 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Remember Valentine
description: Celebrate the holiday with Remember Valentine, a festive card-matching memory game perfect for all ages! Flip cards to reveal delightful Valentine-themed icons like hearts, candies, and Cupid himself, while testing your memory across increasing levels of fun and challenge. With cheerful visuals, cozy music, and endless holiday spirit, it’s the perfect way to make your gaming season merry and bright!

name: There's Always a Madman: The MacGuffin
description:
Secret agent Franklin Benjamin's former-mentor-turned-rogue-agent Dustin MacGuffin has resurfaced to kidnap the one you care about most.

In this single-player interactive spy novel, play as secret agent Franklin Benjamin and use your particular set of skills to save Virginia from the clutches of the madman Dustin MacGuffin.

Which means - you’d better get the MacGuffin!

name: There's Always a Madman: V.I.C.T.O.R.
description:
Secret agent Franklin Benjamin will stop at nothing to save the world.

In the single-player interactive novel villain team-up game "There's Always a Madman: V.I.C.T.O.R.," you play as his greatest adversaries. Can the criminal enterprise known as V.I.C.T.O.R. (short for a "Very Important Collective of Terrorists, Operatives, and Rogues") defeat the only man standing between them and world domination?

To the V.I.C.T.O.R. go the spoils!

name: Maimai Orange Plus
description: maimai ORANGE PLUS was released on March 19, 2015, updating cabinets of the previous release and were implemented sequentially in Korea as well as in Japan. A number of J-POP licensed songs were deleted due to the Sayonara event, but collaboration events are more active than the previous series.

name: Super Duper Multitasking
description: This collection of 24 minigames is presented as a multitasking test. Featuring a unique split-screen display and intuitive control scheme, this expanded version of 2018's Super Multitasking trains--and challenges--you to play up to 3, 4, or even 5 minigames at a time. Tons of modes and features, customizable difficulty, a 2-player Versus mode, 100 challenging Missions, and hundreds of Leaderboards round out the package.

name: Benny Bash
description: Survive this horror/puzzle adventure. Uncover the secrets of a cursed video game from the '80s while a malevolent entity hunts you. Solve escape room-style puzzles, navigate eerie labyrinths, and see how your actions in the game shape the real world. Stay sharp... and stay alive.

name: Fruit Stand Fortune
description: Start with nothing and spin your way to the top! Gather fruit from slot machines and sell them to buy upgrades, new fruit types, and more! Unlock cute customers! Meet a Bear Wizard! Build your fruit empire with Fruit Stand Fortune!

name: Orbital Cascade
description: A puzzle game inspired by classics like Zuma, where you pop colorful bullets, unleash dazzling combos, and rise to conquer the skies. Strategize your moves, master the challenge, and claim victory!

name: Mechanized Corps: Rebirth
description: Mechanized Corps: Rebirth drops you into the war-torn year of 2361, where Mechanized Corps fight for control of the Sol system's resources. Choose from four customizable classes, arm yourself with devastating weapons, and fight in intense squad-based combat. Battle offline or online with friends!

name: Eldritch Escape
description:
In this roguelike bullet-heaven, Earth has been consumed by an ancient eldritch god. Form a customizable squad of survivors and explore decaying, metroidvania-inspired worlds trapped within the god’s belly. Battle endless waves of nightmarish creatures, extract resources, rescue survivors, uncover forbidden knowledge, and search for a way out.

Portals powered by ancient eldritch forces link worlds and realities, forming a tangled web. With a limited oxygen supply, your squad has just 20 minutes to navigate the portal network, jumping from world to world in search of the one escape route. Can you escape the void in time?

name: Lapso
description: Classic survival horror with a modern feel. Solve puzzles, search for items, manage your inventory, and pray you'll return to the safe room alive in this decaying twisted facility consumed by a mysterious metallic corruption.

name: Maimai Pink
description: maimai PiNK is the 4th entry in the maimai series. This version is said to be focused on anime and vocaloid music.

name: Hotel Blue Rose no 99 no Heya
description: Sin descripción

name: Maimai Pink Plus
description: An expanded updated to maimai PiNK.

name: First Steps in the NICU: Discovery Edition
description:
Welcome to “First NICU Experience”! Experience neonatal care in this serious game. As a nursing student, work with medical staff and families to care for infants and tackle post-discharge challenges. With interactive choices and story-driven gameplay, learn key skills in 1 hour.

Players take on the role of a nursing student participating in clinical training at a NICU. By collaborating with medical staff and families, you will learn the basics of neonatal intensive care, communication with patient families, and the challenges of transitioning from hospital to home care.

name: Maimai Murasaki
description: The fifth title in the maimai series of SEGA's rhythm arcade releases.

name: Maimai Murasaki Plus
description: An expanded update to maimai MURASAKi, released in Japan, Singapore and Indonesia.

name: The Pub Life Simulator
description: Open your own pub with The Pub Life Simulator, serve food and drinks to keep your customers happy. Enjoy this exciting simulation experience solo or with friends. Unlock higher-quality products, expand your pub, and build the best business in town!

name: Vox Populi: Germany 2025
description: Play as an existing or fully customisable political figure, and campaign for many alternative German elections! In "Vox Populi: Germany 2025", you and the characters around you must promote your ideas and your popularity throughout the country to claim victory!

name: Dancing Pandas: Ranger's Path
description: Calling all animal lovers! Become the ranger for Summery Islands! Find courage by helping other Pandas. Dancing Pandas: a cozy adventure where bravery blooms beyond your comfort zone.

name: Prolonged Winter
description: Prolonged Winter is an MBF21 mapset of 6 maps (5 beatable maps + 1 stopper map) which are wintery and surreal, using @OverflowingMocha's lovely DreamPal palette. The maps have a heavy focus on creating a sort of dream-like atmosphere, often containing experimental gameplay and visuals, while some maps have no enemies at all. Most of them are relatively short, with the exception of MAP05.

name: Biofactory
description: Build your living factory using organs and fleshy biomachines. Combine your pulsating machines to automate and scale up production. Mine, harvest, produce and assemble weird materials in a grimdark biopunk setting. No enemies or pressure, the hive mind has only one instinct: The factory must grow.

name: Stones Keeper II: Chaos Lord
description:
In Stones Keeper II: Chaos Lord, you'll immerse yourself in a fantasy world as a leader of a squad of the Circle of Unquenchable Thirst. Along with recruiting, leveling, arming, and providing for your army, you'll be in charge of your very own flying fortress. Growing it and improving its system will prove invaluable to challenges ahead.

You'll be able to create a unique squad, by recruiting new warriors with a multitude of skills and weapon preferences. The tasks that will be assigned to you will require not only the strength of your warriors, but also cunning. The search for valuable artifacts, raiding cities, subduing enemy commanders, desecrating lands, and capturing altars are only a few of the challenges you will face.

Every choice opens up opportunities. Change tactics and try new powers. In "Stones Keeper II: Chaos Lord" all means are good to leave your mark on history, be it force, diplomacy, or magic! Your decisions will determine the fate of the kingdom.

name: Destiny 2: Heresy - Act 1
description: The Dreadnaught has returned. Gather your allies and bring order to chaos as shadows gather in the galaxy. Descend into the ship and stem the Taken tide before it overwhelms Earth in the new three-player activity. the Nether.

name: 2004Scape
description: Lost City is a unofficial non-profit project focused on preservation through open-source emulation accessibility.

name: Edict
description: Welcome to Edict! Take up the role of a fortunate judgement agent sent to destroy the word of Nowherehoods soul engine!

name: Mournight
description: Mournight is a horror game where 1-4 players collaborate to survive and solve the mystery. Explore locked rooms, collect cursed objects, and stay alert against a terrifying creature that hunts you in the dark.

name: Tales of Ancients
description: Tales of Ancients is an atmospheric exploration game that tells the story of a man struggling to survive in a deserted town while tracing an ancient cult. In this world filled with heavy rain and mysterious rituals, you will uncover dark secrets.

name: Cafemart Simulator
description: Create and decorate your cozy cafe, where guests can enjoy delicious food and drinks. Expand your service with a supermarket offering a wide selection of fresh products, so visitors can not only have a tasty meal but also do some shopping. Play solo or with friends in cooperative mode!

name: The Immemorial Order II Sisters of Darkness
description: The Immemorial Order II Sisters of Darkness is primarily a spooky, atmospheric, first-person walking simulator that doesn't take itself too seriously.

name: The House
description: The House is a single player horror and thriller game. As a journalist, you are trapped in a house where the paranormal is on the rise. It's up to you to find photos, notes and tapes and escape the house to survive!

name: Whale Flesh
description: A short horror game where you dig through the flesh of a giant whale to find out what happened to your team.

name: Coffin Delivery
description: Trapped in a haunted mansion on your first day delivering coffins, you must uncover its dark secrets to survive. Explore eerie halls and evade a stalking demonic presence as you race to gather the ghost's remains and find a way out alive.

name: Behind The Backrooms: Lost Levels
description: Behind The Backrooms: Lost Levels is Co-op 1-6 survival horror game where you explore eerie, hidden levels filled with terrifying entities, cryptic puzzles, and relentless dangers. survive deadly encounters, and find your way out—before you become another lost soul trapped forever.

name: Webstore Mogul
description: Rise to become a webstore mogul by managing your own online shop. Set prices for your products, manage inventory, hire employees, and design your online store. With strategic decisions and effective management, you will build a successful online business.

name: Replicube
description: Replicube is an open-ended programming puzzle game/toy about writing code to replicate 3D voxel-based objects. Solve puzzles, pursue leaderboard glory, or just make art to share with the in-game community.

name: Jerkmate: Ranked
description:
Rejoice: Jerkmate Ranked is real! All the hilarious user-generated content has inspired Jerky to make one more fantasy come true. Play the Jerkmate Ranked game to reach the highest ranks of fapping mastery. Will you be the next Grandmaster Baiter, or should you bear the Bronze Beater title forever? Your destiny (and hopefully something else) is now in your hands!

Jerkmate Ranked is more than an Internet trend. It’s a statement for all jerkers, fappers, wankers, gooners, edgers and meat beaters worldwide. United, we stand firm! Let’s honor Jerky, our universal symbol of sexual freedom, inclusiveness and diversity. Flaunt your Jerkmate rank like an honor badge because it is. Good luck, and may the nuts be with you.

name: Door Game Deluxe
description: Door Game Deluxe is a (very) short, satirical RPG. An expansion of the original and the pinnacle of human artistic expression, this version offers original art and music on top of new endings.

name: Calyx
description: A strategy game with a new kind of enemy, Calyx puts you in charge of a space mining outpost, locked in battle with an overwhelming alien organism. Build your base, gather resources, assemble your forces, and take on the Calyx. With only an out-of-date AI for company, can you survive?

name: Sil and the Fading World
description: Battle against fearsome Raidbosses alone! Uncover your past in Aritas, a sinister world ravaged by ancient Gods of the Realm Below. This ARPG features 9 class specializations, hundreds of unique items, a vast array of skills, complex character progression, and intense Raidboss encounters.

name: Retro Game Store Simulator
description: Build your own Video Game Store in 1984. Everyday until the end of 1989 gives you the opportunity to stock shelves, cycle your inventory, manage your prices, analyze historical trends to make your game store profitable. Use era-relevant technology and systems to prove that gaming has a future!

name: Crank
description: Sin descripción

name: The Great Yokai of the Haunted Halls
description: You and your childhood friend Yua were supposed to just pick up a book from the decrepit building, but when a sudden twist of fate sends the two of you stumbling into a hidden realm teeming with spirits and yokai, it'll be up to you to find a way out! In this eerie supernatural dimension, you meet Izuna, who claims to be a great yokai with a fondness for humans. Can you escape this otherworldly realm, with the help of Izuna and the Kosaka sisters' spiritual powers?

name: Natsu no Sagashimono: What We Found That Summer
description: Summer vacation is finally here, and the next few weeks promise to be anything but uneventful! Natsu has just 30 days to acclimate to life in the countryside, help the locals face their demons, find that special someone, and gain the self-confidence to return home with his head held high!

name: El Chavo
description: It is a game made in the original Game Boy resolution of 160 x 144 pixels. It has 10 levels and 2 types of enemies. Collect diamonds in each level to open the exit and escape.

name: Touhou Makuka Sai: Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part III
description: "Touhou Makuka Sai ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part III" is a bullet hell shooting game with an arcade golden age style. It is the third game in the Touhou Makuka Sai series. The strange moon seems to hide a new conspiracy. Charge into the deep world on the eternal night!

name: Meet the Myths: An Ormhildur the Brave Game
description: Join granny at the State Research Department of Magic to finish the board of creatures!

name: Maimai Milk
description: maimai 's 6th title. It began operation on December 14, 2017, and began operation in Korea in mid-to-late December.

name: To the Mountain
description: A simple game about going through a Mountain.

name: Memory Data Memory
description: A short, simple game about transporting data.

name: Maimai Milk Plus
description: PLUS version of maimai MiLK, the 6th work of the maimai series . In Japan, operation began on June 20-21, 2018, and in Korea, most of the updates were completed on June 22. However, some of them were completed the following week, June 25th.

name: Cleaner Boy
description:
A platform action game about a boy cleaning his house...with some brute force.

Sweep, clean and combo your way through your house, until every piece of junk is taken care of.

A small game made in 1 week for the GBJam 8.

name: Super Magic Chess
description: Super Magic Chess is an online mobile strategy game that combines chess strategies with card game mechanics, where you can create your deck with over 100 cards and make unique moves, and offers both a classic chess-inspired and innovative gaming experience.

name: It's Raining Acorn!
description: It’s Raining Acorn! is an idle pachinko drafting game where strategy meets nature in a beautifully crafted, vertically scrolling forest. It sits on the side of your desktop and you can leave it running while you work, but good luck focusing when you see those acorns bounce, roll, and trigger satisfying combos across your custom-built forest.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD Randomizer
description: Randomizer mod for the Nintendo Switch remaster of Skyward Sword.

name: Il Fiore di Moretti
description: You are a renowned chef who accepts a job at "Il Fiore di Moretti," an Italian restaurant preparing for its grand reopening. Your task is to cook and ensure that customers return for your delicious food. However, you start to notice that strange things are happening in the restaurant. They are subtle, almost imperceptible, but enough to make you realize that something is very wrong...

name: A Tale of Body Limbs
description:
This is an historical experience based on the real life and death of Mary and Percy Shelley.

Through fragments and scattered remains, the player pieces together a story of love, death, and creation.

name: Be Brave, Barb
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Hailstorm
description: A short story where you enter the shoes of a researcher sent to uncover the mysteries of a project abandoned deep within the Antarctic circle.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: True Three Kingdoms
description: True Three Kingdoms, or 真·三國無雙 in Chinese, is an unlicensed game for the Game Boy Color developed by BBD and released by Sintax in 2002. It is loosely based on the Dynasty Warriors hack-and-slash series.

name: The Lost Sanatorium
description: You are a famous researcher, and you found out that in a very popular sanatorium that thousands of people visit, an accident happened where nobody knows what really happened. Many people say that it was a fire or something. The sanatorium has been abandoned for almost a year, but you want to find out what actually happened. So you go to the mountains and try to find out. Finally, you reach the sanatorium, which is very far from any communication/internet. You experience a lot in your visit, but then suddenly...

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva MMFE
description: This mod is about having AFT/FT and MEGA39s songs ported into Project DIVA F! It will have new modules (edited too, so they can fit PDF style), actual redesigned charts with technical zones*, and chance time events for almost all songs. There will also be new menu graphics, new sprites, you will be able to use DIVA Room and Edit Mode using brand new modules and stages!

name: ViCrew

description: A psychological horror game that blurs the lines between love, fear, and reality. The story begins with Eve Levine, a college student caught in a nightmare after being abducted on a rainy evening in the shadowy St. Peters Park. Her fiancé, Adam Hale, a poet haunted by his own creations, must confront the darkness that emerges from his mysterious writings.

On the brink of the Puppet Frenzy massacre, you follow a legendary Stalker—a mysterious guide—through untold stories and chilling secrets. name: Armored Core: Project Phantasma
description: A Raven operating out of Isaac City receives an unusual request. Not only is the request both vague and cryptic, stating simply: "Infiltrate the underground urban complex, Amber Crown,", but it also bypasses normal channels of communication and is sent directly to the Raven in question, without anyone else seeing the message. No sender name or corporate affiliation is mentioned, but the monetary reward promised is massive. Because of the amount, the mission will obviously be intensely dangerous, but Ravens aren't the type to shy away from any challenge. With interest piqued, the Raven climbs into the AC and heads toward Amber Crown.

name: Armored Core: Master of Arena

During one of the most violent encounters between the corporations, a large number of innocent civilians are caught up in the chaos and perish. One survivor, a young man, loses his entire family. A few months later, the embittered survivor decides to take action and exact revenge; his target is the pilot of an AC. That pilot is simply known as "Hustler One", and he pilots the AC around which events on that tragic day played out. In order to discover more and track down his quarry, the young man seeks out recruitment with the Ravens' Nest. And so, another Raven enters the fold…

name: Sky Shark
description:
The NES port of Sky Shark. Sky Shark (released in Japan as "Hi Sho Zame", and in Europe as "Flying Shark")is a military-themed vertically scrolling shoot 'em up game in which players take control of the titular biplane through five increasingly difficult levels in order to defeat an assortment of military enemy forces like tanks, battleships, airplanes and artillery as the main objective. The title initially appears to be very standard, as players control their plane over a constantly scrolling background and the scenery never stops moving until a runway is reached. Players have only two weapons at their disposal: the standard shot that travels a max distance of the screen's height and three bombs.

The bombs are powerful weapons capable of obliterating any enemy caught within its blast radius. Various items are scattered through every stage that appear by destroying certain enemies: Shooting down colored waves of enemy planes spawn items like "S" power-up icons, point bonuses and extra lives. Certain enemies on the ground spawn "B" icons that increases the player's bomb stock when destroyed.
Every time the player lands at a runway beyond the first takeoff, the amount of bombs multiply 3000 points to the player's total score.

Players are given three lives initially and bonus lives are awarded at 50000 points and thereafter. The game employs a checkpoint system in which a downed single player will start off at the beginning of the checkpoint they managed to reach before dying. Getting hit by enemy fire will result in losing a live, as well as a penalty of decreasing the plane's firepower to his original state and once all lives are lost, the game is over unless players insert more credits into the arcade machine to continue playing. Completing the last stage restarts the game with the second loop increasing in difficulty.

name: TDS Legacy
description:
TDS Legacy is a classic 2D MMORPG developed in Argentina. It is an open-source game inspired by Ultima Online, featuring a medieval fantasy world where players can explore, fight monsters, complete quests, and engage in PvP combat. The game allows players to choose from different races (such as humans, elves, and dwarves) and professions (warrior, mage, thief, among others).

One of its most distinctive features is its hardcore PvP system, where players can attack and loot others freely, making survival a challenge. The game also includes guild wars, magic spells, and crafting mechanics. Over the years, various community-driven servers have emerged, each with unique modifications and custom content. Despite its simple graphics and retro gameplay, Argentum Online has maintained a dedicated player base for decades.
